anyone.

Edited June 12, 2013 by Spartwo

I think you have too many control surfaces. The canards and the flaps exert quite a bit of turning power, really quickly. More flaps on a large plane can mean a better response, but on such a small plane, it only adds to the jitteryness.

EDIT: Also, where's your rudder? How are you keeping from turning left/right?
